EmailTemplate.name: Everest downtime reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: Everest Downtime
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REMINDER
You are receiving this notification because the Sales Force and Partner Collaboration (SFPC) profile will be affected by the upcoming Everest Release activities. Please take a moment to note the times and dates when the integration link to SFPC will not be available and how these activities will impact you.
Everest Key Messages:
­ The SFPC application will remain online; however, the integration link to forecasting and the customer data validation process will not operate in the hours from:
6pm on Thursday August 11th to 5pm Sunday, Aug 14th (US West Coast time) ­ Please Note: During this downtime, you will NOT lose any updates between SFPC and OMF. All changes will be queued up and reflected/updated once the integration link is back up. ­ Click here for further details.
If you are experiencing any difficulties, please log a case online with Global Sales and Technical Support GSTS.
Note: In order to expedite your case please ensure you select either ‘E sales - SFPC’ or ‘Salesforce’ in the alphabetical drop down box when selecting your problem type.
If your situation is URGENT, please call GSTS on your theatre specific number:
Americas +1 408 526 8888 option 4 then 4
EMEA +31 20 485 4888 option 3
AsiaPac Local Extension 68888 (+61 2 8446 8888) option 2
Japan Local Extension 6888 option 1 (+81 3 5549 6888) option 2
Thank you for your support.
For corporate legal information please click here: http://www.cisco.com/web/about/doing_business/legal/cri/index.html.
